Texts.Eng: And now let's make some ^green;Wartwine^white;. Combine an ^orange;Empty Glass Bottle^white;, ^orange;Yeast Water^white;, 2 ^orange;Wartweed^white;, and 2 ^orange;Grape Mash^white; in the ^orange;Fermenter^white;.
Excellent! It looks tasty, doesn't it? But this is just the beginning. You'll craft even more glorious alcohol soon!
